sources.title: A Song for Miss Julie (1945)
sources.description: Two playwrights and a former burlesque queen travel to Louisiana to research a musical they're planning on a local Southern hero. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-song-for-miss-julie-1945/

sources.title: Song for Miss Julie, A
sources.description: A woman tries to block the production of an operetta written about her relative. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: A Song for Miss Julie (1945) ROMANCE
sources.description:
Stars: Shirley Ross, Barton Hepburn, Jane Farrar 
Director: William Rowland

A former burlesque queen and two playwrights travel to Louisiana to research a musical about a local Southern hero.

metadata.Plot: A Broadway writing team visits the granddaughter and great-great-granddaughters of a songwriter for his life story. An old diary holds interesting stories, but granny is protective of the family reputation. New romance complicates things.
metadata.Writer: Rowland Leigh, Michael Foster, Leighton Brill
metadata.Actors: Shirley Ross, Barton Hepburn, Jane Farrar
